name: Dark Webmail (IITG)
description: Say goodbye to the old school webmail!
additional_info:
Update : Added Choices for Background Image & an option to upload own.

Selecting Messages made easier-
Increased size of check boxes and its label so now you can
select messages by clicking on the name of sender.

Responsive images and input boxes- 
Initially their appearance might disturb you, but you will find it is fun to play with them.

Unread Messages highlighted
